: O O

is O O

against O O

of O O

exception O O

, O O

information O O
on O O
business O O
case O O
for O O
doing O O

on O O

of O O

Project O O
: O O
Alert O O
messaging O O
is O O
the O O
process O O
of O O
reliably O O
and O O
securely O O
circulating O O
messages O O
associated O O

with O O
an O O
event O O
to O O
interested O O
users O O
. O O

to O O
the O O
growth O O
of O O

( O O

and O O

telecommunications O O
sectors O O
in O O

recent O O

of O O
alert O O
messages O O
has O O
become O O

prompt O O
and O O
easier O O
. O O

the O O
existing O O
business O O
environment O O
faces O O
the O O

of O O

increasingly O O

through O O

which O O

to O O
time O O
the O O

precisely O O

Project O O
: O O
Alert O O
messaging O O
is O O
the O O
process O O
of O O
reliably O O
and O O
securely O O
circulating O O
messages O O
associated O O

with O O
an O O
event O O
to O O
interested O O
users O O

to O O

Invoicing O O
is O O
an O O
on O O
- O O

Web O O
- O O
based O O

/ O O

application O O

will O O

vendor O O
/ O O

invoice O O
data O O

and O O

workflow O O
and O O
approval O O

not O O

in O O

SunSystems O O

and O O
